mutants.code:
def find_triangle_vertices(mid1, mid2, mid3):
    (x1, y1) = mid1
    (x2, y2) = mid2
    (x3, y3) = mid3
    a1 = x1 - x2 - x3
    a2 = 2 * x1 - a1
    a3 = 2 * x2 - a2
    b1 = y1 - y2 + y3
    b2 = 2 * y1 - b1
    b3 = 2 * y2 - b2
    vertices = [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]
    vertices.sort()
    return vertices

def find_triangle_vertices(mid1, mid2, mid3):
    (x1, y1) = mid1
    (x2, y2) = mid2
    (x3, y3) = mid3
    a1 = (x1 - x2) * x3
    a2 = 2 * x1 - a1
    a3 = 2 * x2 - a2
    b1 = y1 - y2 + y3
    b2 = 2 * y1 - b1
    b3 = 2 * y2 - b2
    vertices = [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]
    vertices.sort()
    return vertices

    b3 = 0 * y2 - b2
    vertices = [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]
    vertices.sort()
    return vertices

def find_triangle_vertices(mid1, mid2, mid3):
    (x1, y1) = mid1
    (x2, y2) = mid2
    (x3, y3) = mid3
    a1 = x1 - x2 + x3
    a2 = 2 * x1 - a1
    a3 = 2 * x2 - a2
    b1 = y1 - y2 + y3
    b2 = 2 * y1 - b1
    b3 = 1 * y2 - b2
    vertices = [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]
    vertices.sort()
    return vertices

def find_triangle_vertices(mid1, mid2, mid3):
    (x1, y1) = mid1
    (x2, y2) = mid2
    (x3, y3) = mid3
    a1 = x1 - x2 + x3
    a2 = 2 * x1 - a1
    a3 = 2 * x2 - a2
    b1 = y1 - y2 + y3
    b2 = 2 * y1 - b1
    b3 = -2 * y2 - b2
    vertices = [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]
    vertices.sort()
    return vertices
